thread.title: Manchester United’s £89million star Paul Pogba has taken THREE months to pay his £100 bill to a removal man
thread.title_full: Manchester United’s £89million star Paul Pogba has taken THREE months to pay his £100 bill to a removal man

author: Tobias Bowman
title: Manchester United’s £89million star Paul Pogba has taken THREE months to pay his £100 bill to a removal man
text:
EFL Pog cash hog Manchester United’s £89million star Paul Pogba has taken THREE months to pay his £100 bill to a removal man 
Premier League ace has taken over three months to pay a removal man what he earns in a matter of minutes Exclusive 18th March 2017, 12:54 am Updated: 18th March 2017, 1:06 am
